name: Bike Racing In Hill Road
description:
Do you feel the need for speed games? Bike Racing In Hill Road is the latest, free, arcade offroad hill climb bike racing game, available now for free! Race your very own moto-cross dirt bike over stunts ramps, through tunnels, over fences, jumping off cranes!

Key Features:
- Fantastic off road bike racing missions just for you!
- Retro hill climb bike race vehicles to race with!
- Practise your speedway driving skills!
- Amazing parker practise simulator with high speed features!
